title: (x) "Yappy Hour" scratchy/brush face - Tiki Surf {Ken M}
content:
I could have sworn this was a House Industries font but I cannot find at their site.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229103846im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/YH_6351.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Vardis logo - similar to AG Book Rounded/Helvetica Rounded {Ken M}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229103846/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38109 "Go to previous forum topic") [ART + AUCTION magazine logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229103846/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38102 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vector

comments.content: (with an illustrator brush applied to it from the looks of things)

\> (with an illustrator brush applied to it from the looks of things)

The font actually looks just like that.  
The right stem of the U looks too thin.
